title: kayle and morgana login theme
body: ok guys, anyone here knows who is the singer in kayle and morgana theme ? the vocal part ! ty

replies.body: Yep - you can even hear them overlap on the intro. They have pretty different timbers, IMHO. Kayle has a very pure tone, and Morgana sings with much more vibrato.

Kayle is sung by Suzanne Waters and Morgana is sung by Elyse Willis!

Thanks for listening!
